review: It works OKAY, but I think it needs an interface to better control it. It works actively, but not passively. For example, you launch Netflix, choose your movie, click play, and then click on the little icon to pass it to Chromecast. I can pause and rewind on the PC, but most of the time, I cannot pause or rewind the Chromecast. If there was an interface that had better control over the "casting", it would be fantastic.
author: A. Gift For You

review: ok as a fixed device on your fast home network.  a pain to setup when moving TV's.  glitch and slow at times.  couldn't get it to work on hotel network due to 'terms and accept' on login.

review: I'm disappointed.  I have a Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 12.2 and it's extremely slow trying to push content to the Chromecast.  My Chromecast is about 3' from my wireless router.  Many apps (like VLC) don't even support it.
